legend_0025_hakase_02a:
I detect that [VAR PKNAME(0001)] has regained some
of its original power.[VAR 0114(000B)]
legend_0025_hakase_02b:
I detect that [VAR PKNAME(0001)] has regained some
of its original power.[VAR 0114(000E)]
legend_0025_hakase_03a:
It seems it will now be able to [VAR COLOR(0006)]dash[VAR COLOR(0000)] at high
speeds while you’re riding upon it.[VAR 0114(000B)]
legend_0025_hakase_03b:
It seems it will now be able to [VAR COLOR(0006)]dash[VAR COLOR(0000)] at high
speeds while you’re riding upon it.[VAR 0114(000E)]
legend_0025_hakase_04a:
While you’re riding upon it, it seems it can now
[VAR COLOR(0006)]jump[VAR COLOR(0000)] higher if you press and hold the B Button.[VAR 0114(000B)]
legend_0025_hakase_04b:
While you’re riding upon it, it seems it can now
[VAR COLOR(0006)]jump[VAR COLOR(0000)] higher if you press and hold the B Button.[VAR 0114(000E)]
legend_0025_hakase_05a:
After it has jumped into the air, you should try
pressing the B Button again. It should [VAR COLOR(0006)]glide[VAR COLOR(0000)] now.[VAR 0114(000B)]
legend_0025_hakase_05b:
After it has jumped into the air, you should try
pressing the B Button again. It should [VAR COLOR(0006)]glide[VAR COLOR(0000)] now.[VAR 0114(000E)]
legend_0025_hakase_06a:
While riding upon it, it seems you should now be
able to [VAR COLOR(0006)]move across water[VAR COLOR(0000)].[VAR 0114(000B)]
legend_0025_hakase_06b:
While riding upon it, it seems you should now be
able to [VAR COLOR(0006)]move across water[VAR COLOR(0000)].[VAR 0114(000E)]
legend_0025_hakase_07a:
It should now be able to [VAR COLOR(0006)]climb up[VAR COLOR(0000)] any vertical
surfaces it grabs on to while you’re riding upon it.[VAR 0114(000B)]
legend_0025_hakase_07b:
It should now be able to [VAR COLOR(0006)]climb up[VAR COLOR(0000)] any vertical
surfaces it grabs on to while you’re riding upon it.[VAR 0114(000E)]
legend_0025_hakase_08a:
I hope you will continue to explore Paldea with
[VAR PKNAME(0001)], as you have done here.\c
Your route is not fixed but open before you.\c
Seek out your own path, using your map and the
tools you have at hand.\c
Whenever you find your curiosity piqued, you
should go and explore as your heart desires.\c
All that you experience will help you grow in
some way, great or small.[VAR 0114(000B)]

I hope you will continue to explore Paldea with

legend_0025_hakase_09a:
Go forth on your journey...and take good care of
[VAR PKNAME(0001)] for me.[VAR 0114(000B)]
